name: select2decode
description: 选中 Base64 编码文本，然后单击右键菜单「Decode Base64 Text」解码

scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/{images,stylesheets} dist/ && BUILD_TARGET=content rollup -c rollup.config.js && BUILD_TARGET=background rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.build-for-firefox: web-ext lint -s dist && web-ext build -s dist -a artifacts
scripts.sign-for-firefox: web-ext lint -s dist && web-ext sign --api-key ${AMO_API_KEY} --api-secret ${AMO_API_SECRET} --id select2decode@zbinlin -s dist -a artifacts

author: zbinlin
